alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emery and south central Carbon Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 320 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles southeast of Huntington, or 28 miles south of Price, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Carbon and Woodside. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 259 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
